channel.title: How do i make someone an admin? or mod?
channel.description:
[b]how do i make someone an amin or mod? whenever i go to characters and change the 0 to a 3 and save it once they'v logged out it doesnt work no crown or anything and when they log out again it just changes back to a 0 plz help thnx.
[/b] [b]I dont think its saving the game because my friend changed to a girl loged out and in she was a boy agian anyways to fix a game that doesnt save? [/b]

item.title: How do i make someone an admin? or mod?
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

Some times I wonder why people are called senior members… To change a playerRight level you simply:

  1. Open client.java

  2. Search for:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod(silvercrown), 2 = staff(goldcrown), 3 = admin(goldcrown)

Under that you should see:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { playerRights = 3; }

  1. Inside of the ("")) insert the players name.

This will make the player the server owner. Similarly underneath this you should see playerRights = 2; that means that the player name within the ("")) is an admin.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make someone an admin? or mod?

item.title: How do i make someone an admin? or mod?
item.dc:creator: @domo9122 domo9122
item.description:
@domo9122 wrote:

Some sources don’t work like that though

Go to client.java and search mod untill you find moderator and then scroll down a bit and in between “” put your name example “DOM”

item.title: How do i make someone an admin? or mod?
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

and if your account isnt the owner char change the rights to 3

if you double click the character file in the character folder theres a part where it says “Charater rights = 0” change the number

1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner/co owner

Read full topic

easy you go to characters

click a name and make the player rights 1 or 2 2-admin 1-p mod.
